resources.string: If you\'re thinking about\nwhat to eat now,\nask anyting!

When the menu doesn\’t
come to mind,
Please let me know
as below example!

Let\’s look at the
recommended food,
I can get another
recommendation!
3 food recommendations\na day you can get it!
Please recommend a noodle dish\nthat\'s good to eat in hot weather!
Please recommend food with protein,\nnot meat!
Glad to see you:)\n I\'ll help you with\ntoday\'s fun meal!
Please choose between breakfast, lunch, and dinner, midnight meal!
Please choose your favorite food type!
Please choose the type of food you don\'t like!
Is there anything you would like to exclude from the 10 menus you recommended recently?
Please let me know what you want additionally!
* The more detailed it is, the better
Ex. Since I\'m allergic to nuts, please recommend anything other than those with nuts!
I don\'t have any recommendations yet!
I don\'t have any recent recommendations,\nso please press the next button!
